Sequence Information.Source: predicted from Venom Gland Transcriptome,Pamphobeteus verdolaga

Literature.Author: Salinas-Restrepo C, Naranjo-Duran AM, Quintana J, Bueno J, Guzman F, Hoyos Palacio LM, Segura C.2023
Literature.Title: Short Antimicrobial Peptide Derived from the Venom Gland Transcriptome of Pamphobeteus verdolaga Increases Gentamicin Susceptibility of Multidrug-Resistant Klebsiella pneumoniae

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (53.33%) toHm-AMP4R: 33%; L: 22%.Activity: active against  E. coli (MIC 100 uM), and  P.aeruginosa ATCC 9027 (MIC 200 uM).
